ValidationRule.description: Validates that Promotion Valid From and Promotion Valid Thru both or none are filled. If both are filled, validates that Promotion Valid From <= Promotion Valid Thru
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( OR( AND( ISBLANK(cgcloud__Promotion_Valid_From__c), ISBLANK(cgcloud__Promotion_Valid_Thru__c)), AND( NOT ISBLANK(cgcloud__Promotion_Valid_From__c), NOT ISBLANK(cgcloud__Promotion_Valid_Thru__c), cgcloud__Promotion_Valid_From__c <= cgcloud__Promotion_Valid_Thru__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Valid From and Valid Thru can't be empty and Valid From can't be later than Valid Thru if the Role 'Promotion' is assigned to the Customer.
